title: Setting up adaptive streaming media sources
summary: Let's say you want to set up an adaptive streaming media source on a server, to be consumed inside an HTML media element. How would you do that? This article explains how, looking at two of the most common formats: MPEG-DASH and HLS (HTTP Live Streaming.)
